content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cyber Security is an increasing risk for both P&G and our External Business Partners. Please remain alert and diligent and continue to improve your capabilities to protect all our supply chains. We encourage you to explore and adopt best practices and certifications that support the needs of P&G and the other CPGs and industries with whom you work.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These are Information Security expectations for all external business partners who deploy, manage, or support P&G IT assets (applications, data, platforms, software, networks and information systems) and / or require access privileges to any P&G system to perform their role. For other Information Security related guidelines, please review the “IT” section below.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Guidelines:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pgsupplier.com/-/media/PGSupplier/Documents/PG%20Policies/threat%20and%20incident%20management%20policy.pdf?la=en-US&v=1-202005201037&hash=2DE24C0BDB3F4AC8253D4510D3CD288DF16BE1B7\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Info Security Threat & Incident
